Red Fort blast: Explosion that killed 8 occurred in Hyundai i20 car - what we know so far
description: A devastating blast ripped through a Hyundai i20 near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station, claiming at least eight lives and injuring 24. Authorities have launched a high-alert across multiple states, with the NIA and NSG investigating the explosion. Prime Minister Modi and home minister Shah are actively monitoring the situation and offering support.

Delhi blast: 9 killed; top cop says slow-moving car burst into flames at traffic signal
description: A car blast near Delhi's Red Fort Metro Station on Monday resulted in at least nine fatalities and 24 injuries. The explosion, which also caused a fire damaging nearby vehicles, has prompted a high alert in the capital and across Uttar Pradesh. The cause of the blast remains under investigation.

Tesla’s AI shift: Ming-Chi Kuo on why Elon Musk is moving chip supply from TSMC; says cost and control are key
description: Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo confirms Elon Musk's push for Tesla to build its own semiconductor fabs, signaling a strategic move for AI control. Musk's aggressive timeline for next-gen AI chips, moving from AI5 to AI6 in under a year, validates Kuo's analysis. This shift addresses geopolitical risks, R&D flexibility, and vertical integration goals, moving beyond mere supply concerns.

Chhattisgarh HC criticises trial courts for long adjournments; urges speedy trial
description: The Chhattisgarh High Court has strongly criticized trial courts for granting long adjournments, especially for undertrials, deeming it a violation of the right to a speedy trial. Directing short, continuous dates for evidence recording, the court emphasized that delays undermine justice. The Chief Justice also ordered the DGP to ensure witness presence for expeditious trial completion.

title: Maharashtra: Pregnant woman, daughter among 4 killed in Vita shop fire
description: A devastating fire, suspected to be caused by an electrical short circuit, claimed the lives of four individuals, including a pregnant woman and her young daughter, in Vita, Sangli. The blaze engulfed an electronics and steel shop, with the victims succumbing to asphyxia from dense smoke. The shop owner, his wife, his pregnant daughter, and granddaughter perished in the incident.

title: Michael Willis Heard death: How TikTok star Yes King tragically died
description: TikTok sensation Michael Willis Heard, known as 'Yes King,' has passed away. His daughter confirmed the news, remembering him for his uplifting videos promoting self-love and confidence. The Elyria, Ohio native, who also served as a life coach and pastor-like figure, inspired millions with his positive energy. His sudden departure has deeply saddened his global fanbase.

title: Sam Altman says, ‘Slack creates a lot of fake work’; Elon Musk responds
description: Elon Musk reacted sharply to Sam Altman's critique of office productivity tools, predicting OpenAI will now directly compete with Microsoft. Altman suggested AI agents could replace tools like Slack, creating "fake work." OpenAI's potential move into selling "AI cloud" services further escalates competition with tech giants.

title: Noah Gray earns NFL Salute to Service nod amid Travis Kelce successor buzz
description: Kansas City Chiefs are preparing for life after Travis Kelce, with tight end Noah Gray emerging as a respected leader, recognized for his military support.  While Gray shines off-field, the team also eyes potential future talent like Oregon's Kenyon Sadiq in the upcoming NFL Draft. Gray's dedication is already shaping the Chiefs' next era.

title: Philanthropy and policy: Bill Gates on US aid spending; says it’s not our role to help govt save money
description: The Gates Foundation has pledged a significant $2.5 billion over five years to boost global women's health, focusing heavily on research and development for innovations like self-injectable contraceptives and rapid STI diagnostics.

title: Klay Thompson apologises to Megan Thee Stallion after airport mishap
description: Dallas Mavericks star Klay Thompson went viral for his heartfelt apology and remorse after arriving late to pick up girlfriend Megan Thee Stallion from the airport. He presented her with flowers, expressing genuine regret, which fans found "adorably human." The couple's authentic connection continues to charm audiences as they both thrive in their careers.
